content:
During the day of artillery and mortar strikes, almost 15 settlements of Kharkiv region have suffered.

About thisreportedHead of Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov.

Yes, the Russian shelling was suffered by veterinary, Borisovka, Ambarne and others. Air Force was experienced by N.P. Cossack Lopan, Zolochiv, Old.

Late in the evening, the firing of the cabin was recorded in the village. Zolochiv Bohodukhiv district. 5 private homes and power lines are damaged. Without the victims.

Also, the enemy fired at the village. Kozacha Lopan of Kharkiv district. There is a hit in the open territory. Without the victims.

Yesterday, Russia's troops caused shelling and on the village. Kurilovka of Kupyansky district. It was without the victims.

“Over the past day, the enemy has made one unsuccessful attack in the Kupyansk direction in the area of NP. Sinkivka, ”Oleg Synigubov said.

As reportedArmyinform, over the past day, the enemy army made 258 beats on 9 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.
title: Almost 15 settlements of Kharkiv region are fired in a day: where and where were they beaten
description: This was reported by the head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov. ...
author: Army Inform
